statements: UPDATE material_costs SET quantity = 20, total_cost = unit_cost * 20 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE material_costs SET total_cost = unit_cost * 15, quantity = 15 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE material_costs SET total_cost = unit_cost * quantity WHERE material_id = 1
UPDATE material_costs SET unit_cost = unit_cost + 5 WHERE material_id = 2
UPDATE materials SET material_price = 15.99 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE printing_expenses SET expense_cost = 500.00, expense_type = 'Printing Supplies' WHERE expense_id = 2;
UPDATE materials SET material_name = 'Steel', material_price = 25.50 WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE printing_operations SET operation_name = 'Print Job A', material_used = 2, expense_id = 3 WHERE operation_id = 4;

UPDATE expenses SET expense_amount = 500.00, expense_date = '2022-08-11' WHERE expense_id = 2;
UPDATE MaterialCosts SET quantity_purchased = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Expenses SET amount_spent = 500.25, expense_description = 'New Printer' WHERE expense_id = 3;
